DOC.brief_summary: The CHICA system is a clinical decision support system that uses adaptive turnaround documents to provide point-of-care information to clinicians. The investigators will be studying whether it can help in the diagnosis and treatment of tuberculosis and iron deficiency anemia.
DOC.brief_title: Universal Screening for Tuberculosis and Anemia With the CHICA System
DOC.detailed_description: The CHICA system is a clinical decision support system that uses adaptive turnaround documents to provide point-of-care information to clinicians. We will be studying whether it can help in the diagnosis and treatment of tuberculosis and iron deficiency anemia.
DOC.criteria: Age 3 to 11 years old and seen in a study clinic
